timeline.activity: Patient was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes mellitus
Patient experienced sudden onset of giddiness and generalized weakness
Patient started having right buttock pain
Patient was admitted to the hospital
timeline.diagnosis: Pre-renal acute kidney injury secondary to acute gastroenteritis
timeline.treatment: IVF-NS, RL@100 ml/hr, Inj. Ceftriaxone 1gm/IV/BD, Inj. Pan 40mg IV/OD, Inj. Zofen 4mg IV/SOS, Inj. H.Mixtard SC/BD, Inj. Optineuron 1 amp in 100 ml NS/IV/OD

notes.physical_exam: Patient is conscious, coherent, co-operative. Temp-afebrile, PR-91 bpm, BP-100/70 mm of Hg, RR-20/min, Spo2-98% at room air, Pallor-present
notes.investigations: Chest X-ray, ECG, Hb-8.5, Tlc-14,200, Plt-1.5, S. Urea-103, S. Creatinine-3.1, Sodium-131, Potassium-3.5, Chloride-99
